quote: Offputting, even at times nasty.

quote: Crafty, witty.

quote: What an unexpected gift.

quote: The characters have been intriguing to know and easy to care about.

quote: Immensely likable!

quote: It's as if the film were a kind of living notebook for what Rohmer was to do later, with greater ease and refinement.

quote: If it isn't likely to generate what Mr. Brooks himself refers to as 'Spaceballs II: The Search for More Money, neither is it anything less than gentle, harmless satire that occasionally has real bite.

quote: It's Oliver Twist by way of City of God.

quote: ...competent but uninspired...
title: I Know What You Did Last Summer

quote: In a world where everyone is some kind of insider, the viewer may feel left out in the cold.

quote: All of this is handled in a breezy, off-handed, nutsy manner, as the superb cast combines to help bring it off.

quote: Very sexy and very smart!

quote: I was moved and captivated throughout its 132 minutes.

quote: A masterpiece.

title: A Perfect Candidate
